name: Vice Versa
overview: Vice Versa was originally an ancient game invented by the monks of China ago Many centuries. It is a contemplative that reflects the ups and downs of man's life in his journey from birth to death, finally reaching a higher plane of immortality. Every movement you make reflects a case in life. The fight between the "white" pieces and "Blacks" could be interpreted as the conflict between good and evil, success and failure, even between life and death. In old China, monks used to play to see who would achieve immortality on First. Despite its simplicity the game can be rewarding and fun. It has been tested with Great minds and ordinary man has strengthened his popularity for centuries. Take your life in your hands and challenge your friends and family and even the computer to Play Vice Versa
